title: Clinical Practice Competency Enhancement: Intelligent Problem-Solving Learning in AI-Enhanced Environments: Scientific Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge, understanding of problem-solving methodologies, and awareness of basic AI concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Design collaborative role allocation between humans and AI in the scientific problem-solving process using AI tools
Apply three or more creative strategies to solve complex scientific problems in a VR simulation environment

Utilizing AI-based platforms (e.g., ChatGPT, medical simulation tools), learners can establish a 6-month self-directed learning plan applying meta-learning strategies (feedback analysis, goal resetting), conduct biweekly progress reviews, and achieve ≥80% plan adherence.

For five scientific problem-solving scenarios in medical settings (e.g., patient data utilization, new drug experiment design), learners can apply ≥3 ethical principles (e.g., Helsinki Declaration, Patient Rights Charter) to set judgment criteria and produce ethical decision reports with ≥80% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
